sentences.en: Enlightened companies include its human resources in their estimation of the firm's worth.
sentences.cn: 有见识的公司将人力资源包括在公司价值评估中。

sentences.en: Estimations of total world sales are around the 50 million mark.
sentences.cn: 全球的总销售额估计在5,000万左右。

sentences.en: He comes first in my estimation.
sentences.cn: 依我来评价,他应占首位.

sentences.en: He has gone down considerably in my estimation.
sentences.cn: 我对他的评价已经一落千丈。

sentences.en: He is sinking in the estimation of his friends.
sentences.cn: 朋友们对他的评价在降低.

sentences.en: He sank every moment in her estimation by the strong comparison.
sentences.cn: 在明显的对比下,她对杜洛埃的评价越来越低.

sentences.en: He stands high in my estimation.
He stands high in public estimation.
His arrogance lowered him in her estimation.
sentences.cn: 他的妄自尊大降低了他在她心目中的位置.

sentences.en: In my estimation, the applicant is well qualified for this job.
sentences.cn: 据我看, 这位应征者完全具备这项工作的条件.

sentences.en: Mr. Black stands high in the public estimation.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生在公众中声望很高.

sentences.en: She is held in estimation by those who know her.
sentences.cn: 凡是认识她的人都很尊敬她.

sentences.en: The dedicated doctor earned the estimation of his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 那位忠于事业的医生赢得了同事的尊敬.

sentences.en: This depends on the estimation of the temperatures generated by frictional heat.
sentences.cn: 它取决于摩擦热所引起的温度估算.

sentences.en: We must be realistic in our self - estimation, neither being conceited nor belittling ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们对自己的估计应该实事求是, 不要自高自大,也不要妄自菲薄.

sentences.en: Who is the best candidate in your estimation ?
sentences.cn: 你认为谁是最合适的人选？

words.tran_cn: 可估计的；可尊敬的；有价值的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 估计误差，估测误差
最大似然估计；最大相似估计法
抗差估计，稳健估计；强估计

trans.tran_en: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something
